atlas.controller

Class PageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlas.controller.BasicController
      • atlas.controller.PageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @ViewScoped
 @Named(value="pageController")
public class PageController
extends BasicController
implements Serializable
    Provides content for the page. ViewScoped managed bean, controller of content_page.xhtml component. Should be initialized by calling the init() method.
    Author:
    Michal Smrha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageController

        public PageController()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes current Page and content based on bound "pageId". Doesn't include content if page is not published and user is not editor. Limits model componenets to 1 (multiples not supported).

      • updatePage

        public String updatePage(boolean ajax)
        Updates Page and PageContent entities including components based on bound fields. Page info and "components" collection are persisted. Checks if editor is logged. If this check fails, warning is set and changes not saved. If all checks pass, page is updated and info is set.
        Parameters:
        ajax - True if called by ajax, false if refresh is needed.
        Returns:
        Redirection string, null if ajax.

      • addComponent

        public String addComponent(String type)
        Adds a new PageComponent of given type to bound collection "components". Info message is set.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of component to add. Supported: text | headline | model | image
        Returns:
        Null (Redirection string)

      • bumpComponentUp

        public String bumpComponentUp(PageComponent component)
        Moves PageComponent one slot up. Changes component order in bound collection "components" to move a component up by one.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to move up.
        Returns:
        Null (Redirection string)

      • bumpComponentDown

        public String bumpComponentDown(PageComponent component)
        Moves PageComponent one slot down. Changes component order in bound collection "components" to move a component down by one.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to move down.
        Returns:
        Null (Redirection string)

      • removeComponent

        public String removeComponent(PageComponent component)
        Remove PageComponent from bound collection "components".
        Parameters:
        component - Component to remove.
        Returns:
        Null (Redirection string)

      • updateLabels

        public String updateLabels()
        Update and persist model's labels based on bound "labelUpdates". "labelUpdates" is a JSON string representing changed LabelViews. Checks if editor is logged. If this check fails, FacesMessage is set and redirect is null. If all checks pass, labels are updated and redirect reloads page.
        Returns:
        Redirection string.

      • getPageId

        public int getPageId()
        Returns:
        ID of currently active page.

      • setPageId

        public void setPageId(int pageId)
        Parameters:
        pageId - ID of currently active page.

      • getComponents

        public List<PageComponent> getComponents()
        Gets components, which contains localized content of current page.
        Returns:
        List of this page's components. Empty list if pageContent is null.

      • getLabels

        public List<LabelView> getLabels()
        Returns localized model labels if there is a model component present. Returns null if there is no model component or if called prior to calling getComponents().
        Returns:
        Labels for current model or null.

      • getLabelUpdates

        public String getLabelUpdates()
        Returns:
        Label Update JSON.

      • setLabelUpdates

        public void setLabelUpdates(String labelUpdates)
        Set a JSON String representing LabelViews to update.
        Parameters:
        labelUpdates - JSON String from label editor.

      • getPage

        public Page getPage()
        Returns:
        Current page entity.

      • getPageContent

        public PageContent getPageContent()
        Returns:
        Localized content of current page.

      • getSaveButton

        public javax.faces.component.UIComponent getSaveButton()
        Returns:
        Save button component, target of certain messages.

      • setSaveButton

        public void setSaveButton(javax.faces.component.UIComponent saveButton)
        Parameters:
        saveButton - Save button component, target of certain messages.
